inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anaesthesiologists (ASA) physical status class II-III
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with preexisting cerebrovascular diseases, overt neurological signs, alcohol or psychoactive drug addiction
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
